applicant-name.name: KUNMING UNIV OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

invention-title: Method for preparing reducing agent for silicon smelting by upgrading non-viscous high-sulfur bituminous coal through vacuum roasting coupled microorganisms
一种真空焙烧耦合微生物提质无粘高硫烟煤制备硅冶炼用还原剂的方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to a method for preparing a reducing agent for silicon smelting by upgrading non-viscous high-sulfur bituminous coal through vacuum roasting coupled microorganisms, and belongs to the technical field of composite reducing agents for industrial silicon smelting. The method comprises the following steps: uniformly mixing bituminous coal powder and corncob powder to obtain a mixture A, adding a hydrogen peroxide solution into the mixture A, grinding and uniformly mixing to obtain a mixture B; carrying out vacuum roasting on the mixture B at the temperature of 800-1200 DEG C for 30-90 minutes, and carrying out furnace cooling to obtain a roasted mixture C; deionized water, bacterial liquid and sodium silicate are added into the roasting mixture C, microbial leaching is carried out for 5-10 h at the temperature of 25-65 DEG C, standing layering is carried out, and supernate is removed; and repeating the microbiological leaching step until the supernate is neutral, carrying out solid-liquid separation, and drying the solid to obtain the low-sulfur composite reducing agent. The desulfurization rate of the obtained low-sulfur composite reducing agent reaches 91.2-93.7%, the caking index is 28-53, the reaction activation energy is 13.4-17.7 KJ/mol, and the requirements of the composite reducing agent for industrial silicon are met.

本发明涉及一种真空焙烧耦合微生物提质无粘高硫烟煤制备硅冶炼用还原剂的方法，属于工业硅冶炼用复合还原剂技术领域。本发明将烟煤粉和玉米芯粉末混合均匀得到混合物A，混合物A中加入过氧化氢溶液并研磨混匀得到混合物B；混合物B置于温度800～1200℃下真空焙烧30～90min，随炉冷却得到焙烧混合物C；将去离子水、菌液和硅酸钠加入到焙烧混合物C中，在温度25～65℃下进行微生物浸出5～10h，静置分层，去除上清液；重复微生物浸出步骤至上清液为中性，固液分离，固体干燥得到低硫复合还原剂。本发明得到的低硫复合还原剂脱硫率达到91.2～93.7％，粘结指数为28～53，反应活化能为13.4～17.7KJ/mol，满足工业硅用复合还原剂的要求。
